title: Where do i get my reform card
body:
I got a 25 game chat restriction. I probably deserved it but I don't really remember because I never play sober.

Where do I go to look at the card?

replies.body:
You get it automatically on login.
Maybe considering playing sober, unless you are not worried about being permanently banned next, which you will be.

League isn't any fun sober. Is there any way to just be chat banned forever? Then nobody will get pissed. I usually pick teemo and just spam memes as I play.

Dicks out for harambe
Yes, it's called not pressing the enter key during the game.
